column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: The roadway remains shut down due to an earlier collision involving a tanker truck.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: All southbound traffic remains diverted to inbound Newtown Pike to New Circle Rd to N Broadway, then back on to I-75S.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: Police are along the detour route for traffic control.
